definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: The goodness of God should have put them to shame, for they continually sinned against Him.
sentences.chinese: 上帝的美善，倒要突显人们不断犯罪的可耻。

sentences.english: And that good will eventually be victorious.
sentences.chinese: 而那美善至终一定得胜。

sentences.english: So… our lives fill out in goodness.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们的生命在美善中丰盈。

sentences.english: Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good. —Romans.
sentences.chinese: 光明能驱走黑暗，美善必战胜罪恶。

sentences.english: God looks at you and sees a beautiful person waiting to be born.
sentences.chinese: 神眼中的你是一个正待成形的美善之人。

sentences.english: Indeed, we human beings desire for good things.
sentences.chinese: 的确，我们是人都欲望美善。

sentences.english: Organize your attitudes. Fill your heart with the beauty of God' s Word.
sentences.chinese: 调整你的心态，将上帝美善的话语注入你的心。

sentences.english: For connection to occur, something powerful must touch something good.
sentences.chinese: 要有连系出现，就必须有一股力量触发美善。

sentences.english: Father, help people to see your goodness in our brokenness.
sentences.chinese: 父啊，求祢让他人从我们的破碎中看到祢的美善。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
